Package com.mygdx.pirategame.pathfinding.pathfinding.grid.finders

Class GridFinderOptions

java.lang.Object
com.mygdx.pirategame.pathfinding.pathfinding.PathFinderOptions
com.mygdx.pirategame.pathfinding.pathfinding.grid.finders.GridFinderOptions
public class GridFinderOptions extends PathFinderOptions
The options for the pathfinding behavior on a NavigationGridGraph.

  • Field Details

    • allowDiagonal

      public boolean allowDiagonal
      Wether diagonal movement is allowed within the grid.

      Note: This will be ignored in JumpPointFinder, as diagonal movement is required for it

      Default value is true

    • dontCrossCorners

      public boolean dontCrossCorners
      When true, diagonal movement requires both neighbors to be open. When false, diagonal movement can be achieved by having only one open nighbor

      Example: To go from (1,1) to (2,2) when this is set to true, where (x) denotes a non walkable cell, the following applies 

                       Valid           Invalid
             +---+---+---+    +---+---+---+
             |   |   | 0 |    |   | x | 0 |
             +---+---+---+    +---+---+---+
 when True   |   | 0 |   |    |   | 0 |   |
             +---+---+---+    +---+---+---+
             |   |   |   |    |   |   |   |
             +---+---+---+    +---+---+---+


             +---+---+---+
             |   | x | 0 |
             +---+---+---+
 when false  |   | 0 |   |    none
             +---+---+---+
             |   |   |   |
             +---+---+---+

      If allowDiagonal is false, this setting is ignored.

      Default value is true

    • isYDown

      public boolean isYDown
      When false, (0,0) is located at the bottom left of the grid. When true, (0,0) is located at the top left of the grid

      Default value is false

    • orthogonalMovementCost

      public float orthogonalMovementCost
      The cost of moving one cell over the x or y axis

    • diagonalMovementCost

      public float diagonalMovementCost
      The cost of moving one cell over both the x and y axis

  • Constructor Details

    • GridFinderOptions

      public GridFinderOptions()
      Constructs a new GridFinderOptions with the default values: 
       allowDiagonal = true
 dontCrossCorners = true
 PathFinderOptions.heuristic = ManhattanDistance
 isYDown = false
 orthogonalMovementCost = 1
 diagonalMovementCost = 1.4

    • GridFinderOptions

      public GridFinderOptions (boolean allowDiagonals, boolean dontCrossCorners, Heuristic heuristic, boolean isyDown, float orthogonalMovementCost, float diagonalMovementCost)
